definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder

sentences.english: And makes gaps even two can pass abreast.
sentences.chinese: 使墙裂了缝，二人并肩都走得过。

sentences.english: Colleen would urge her sister to join her in bed. As they sat up in bed side by side, holding hands, Colleen and her sister would “just talk.”
sentences.chinese: 当她们姐妹在床上肩并肩手挽手地坐着她们都会聊天。

sentences.english: But bilious outbursts and business success often go hand in hand.
sentences.chinese: 但坏脾气往往与商业上的成功并肩而行。

sentences.english: The two brothers fought together against their attackers.
sentences.chinese: 这两兄弟并肩战斗，反对攻击者。

sentences.english: The first set is side by side.
sentences.chinese: 第一组是肩并肩的一对圆。

sentences.english: We sat side by side in the morning light and looked out at the future together.
sentences.chinese: 我们在晨光中并肩坐着，共同望着我们的将来。

sentences.english: To die fighting side by side with warriors - a dream for any defender of his country.
sentences.chinese: 与战士们并肩在战斗中死去，这是国家保卫者的梦想。

sentences.english: Old buildings and churches stand next to stores and dance halls.
sentences.chinese: 古老的建筑，教堂与商场，舞厅并肩而立。

sentences.english: To die fighting side by side with warriors – a dream for any defender of his country.
sentences.chinese: 与兵士们并肩在战斗中死去，这是国家守御者的空想。

sentences.english: These two personals are running shoulder to shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 这两个人现在正并肩跑著。

sentences.english: Be brave and upright, so God may love thee.
sentences.chinese: 与勇敢并肩而立，因此上帝会爱你。

sentences.english: I went through alcoholism treatment with Rielly.
sentences.chinese: 我和里利一起，肩并肩，终于挺过了酗酒治疗。

sentences.english: We jammed together, shoulder-to-shoulder, in the narrow confines.
sentences.chinese: 在有限的空间里，我们紧紧挤在一起，肩并肩。

sentences.english: Come and take the walk with us step by step we will make cancer history.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，和我们一起并肩而行，一步步将癌症变为历史。

sentences.english: King division north recall past with brother stiffening of the situation, the very sad.
sentences.chinese: 王师北回想起昔日与兄弟并肩杀敌的情形，万分伤感。

sentences.english: I can work with a Democratic president to help this state.
sentences.chinese: 我可以与民主党总统并肩作战，来帮助这个国家。

definition: hand in hand and shoulder to shoulder
in big strides/(fig.) in giant steps
to go with sb/to form companionships
striding forward with head high (idiom); to walk with spirited and vigorous step/to strut
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
at a stride/taking large steps (while walking)
